ai-tha-ap80:1.1_0: “A Buddha praised the appearance of a golden palanquin,
ai-tha-ap80:1.2_0: if he is on the highway;
ai-tha-ap80:3.1_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap80:3.2_0: worshipped by the flowers of flax,
ai-tha-ap80:3.3_0: Tissa the Protector of the World.
ai-tha-ap80:3.4_0: Having seen that there’s no way I’d think,
ai-tha-ap80:4.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap80:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap80:4.4_0: this carpet is full of fruit.
ai-tha-ap80:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pāṭaliputta.
